description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行副行长、中国农业银行董事长、中国证券监督管理委员会主席、中华全国供销合作总社理事会主任等职。现任中国人民银行总行参事。2019年因涉嫌违法违纪被查处。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who has served as Deputy Governor of the People's Bank of China, Chairman of the Agricultural Bank of China, Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission, and Director of the Council of the All-China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives. He is currently a counselor at the head office of the People's Bank of China. He was investigated for suspected violations of law and discipline in 2019.

nodes.id: 中华全国供销合作总社

zh-cn: 中华全国供销合作总社
en: All-China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国性的供销合作社联合组织，由中华人民共和国国务院领导。
description.en: The national federation of supply and marketing cooperatives of the People's Republic of China, led by the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华全国供销合作总社理事会主任，是刘士余的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Council of the All-China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives, and predecessor to Liu Shiyu.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替刘士余担任中华全国供销合作总社理事会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Liu Shiyu as Director of the Council of the All-China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives.

nodes.id: 中国证券监督管理委员会

zh-cn: 中国证券监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院直属的正部级事业单位，负责全国证券期货市场的统一监督管理。
description.en: A ministry-level public institution directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the unified supervision and management of the national securities and futures markets.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。刘士余在中国农业银行及中国证监会任职期间，李克强是其直接上级。
description.en: Chinese statesman, former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. Li Keqiang was Liu Shiyu's direct superior during his tenures at the Agricultural Bank of China and the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国金融家，曾任中国证券监督管理委员会主席，是刘士余的前任。
description.en: Chinese financier, former Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission, and predecessor to Liu Shiyu.

description.zh-cn: 中国金融家，接替刘士余担任中国证券监督管理委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese financier who succeeded Liu Shiyu as Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国大型上市银行，是中国四大银行之一。
description.en: A large listed bank in China, one of the 'Big Four' banks.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、银行家，曾任中国农业银行董事长，是刘士余的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician and banker, former Chairman of the Agricultural Bank of China, and predecessor to Liu Shiyu.

description.zh-cn: 中国银行家，接替刘士余担任中国农业银行董事长。
description.en: Chinese banker who succeeded Liu Shiyu as Chairman of the Agricultural Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省连云港市下辖的县，是刘士余的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Lianyungang City, Jiangsu Province, China. It is the birthplace of Liu Shiyu.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的著名高等学府，是刘士余的母校。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher education located in Beijing, China, and the alma mater of Liu Shiyu.

nodes.id: 清华大学经济管理学院

zh-cn: 清华大学经济管理学院
en: Tsinghua University School of Economics and Management

description.zh-cn: 清华大学下属的学院，刘士余在此获得硕士和博士学位。
description.en: A school within Tsinghua University where Liu Shiyu obtained his master's and doctoral degrees.

description.zh-cn: 刘士余在清华大学的硕士生导师。
description.en: Liu Shiyu's master's thesis advisor at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 刘士余在清华大学的博士生导师。
description.en: Liu Shiyu's doctoral advisor at Tsinghua University.

nodes.id: 上海市经济体制改革办公室

zh-cn: 上海市经济体制改革办公室

description.zh-cn: 上海市政府部门，刘士余曾在此工作。
description.en: A government department in Shanghai where Liu Shiyu once worked.

nodes.id: 国家经济体制改革委员会

zh-cn: 国家经济体制改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经存在的一个部门，刘士余曾在此工作。
description.en: A former department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China where Liu Shiyu once worked.

description.zh-cn: 中国大型国有商业银行，刘士余曾在此任职。
description.en: A large state-owned commercial bank in China where Liu Shiyu once held a position.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央银行。
description.en: The central bank of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 2015年中国股市发生的一次严重下跌事件，该事件被认为是刘士余接替肖钢出任中国证监会主席的背景。
description.en: A severe downturn in the Chinese stock market in 2015, which is considered the context for Liu Shiyu replacing Xiao Gang as the chairman of the CSRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会与中华人民共和国国家监察委员会的合署办公机构，负责党纪和政务的监督、调查和处分。该机构对刘士余进行了审查调查。
description.en: The joint office of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China and the National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China, responsible for supervising, investigating, and disciplining matters of party discipline and government affairs. This body conducted the review and investigation of Liu Shiyu.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家城市商业银行，其资管部总经理戴娟失联案据称与刘士余被查有关。
description.en: A city commercial bank in China. The disappearance case of Dai Juan, the general manager of its asset management department, was reportedly related to the investigation into Liu Shiyu.

description.zh-cn: 时任南京银行资管部总经理，其失联案据称是刘士余被调查的导火索。
description.en: Then General Manager of the Asset Management Department of Bank of Nanjing, whose disappearance case was reportedly the trigger for the investigation into Liu Shiyu.

description.zh-cn: 中国前政治人物，被刘士余指为“阴谋篡党夺权”者之一。
description.en: Former Chinese politician, accused by Liu Shiyu as one of those who 'conspired to usurp the party and seize power'.

description.zh-cn: 中国前政治人物，被刘士余指为“阴谋篡党夺权”者之一。
description.en: Former Chinese politician, accused by Liu Shiyu as one of those who 'conspired to usurp the party and seize power'.

description.zh-cn: 中国前政治人物，被刘士余指为“阴谋篡党夺权”者之一。
description.en: Former Chinese politician, accused by Liu Shiyu as one of those who 'conspired to usurp the party and seize power'.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军前高级将领，被刘士余指为“阴谋篡党夺权”者之一。
description.en: Former senior general of the People's Liberation Army, accused by Liu Shiyu as one of those who 'conspired to usurp the party and seize power'.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军前高级将领，被刘士余指为“阴谋篡党夺权”者之一。
description.en: Former senior general of the People's Liberation Army, accused by Liu Shiyu as one of those who 'conspired to usurp the party and seize power'.

description.zh-cn: 中国前政治人物，被刘士余指为“阴谋篡党夺权”者之一。
description.en: Former Chinese politician, accused by Liu Shiyu as one of those who 'conspired to usurp the party and seize power'.

description.zh-cn: 刘士余出生于江苏省灌云县。
description.en: Liu Shiyu was born in Guanyun County, Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 刘士余于1979年考入清华大学水利工程系，后在清华大学经济管理学院获得硕士及博士学位。
description.en: Liu Shiyu was admitted to the Department of Hydraulic Engineering at Tsinghua University in 1979, and later obtained master's and doctoral degrees from the School of Economics and Management at Tsinghua University.

relationships.target: 清华大学经济管理学院

degree.zh-cn: 管理科学与工程硕士、技术经济及管理博士
degree.en: Master of Management Science and Engineering, Doctor of Techno-economics and Management

description.zh-cn: 刘士余于1987年在清华大学经济管理学院获得硕士学位，2002年获得博士学位。
description.en: Liu Shiyu received his master's degree from the School of Economics and Management at Tsinghua University in 1987, and his doctoral degree in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 叶焕庭是刘士余在清华大学的硕士论文导师。
description.en: Ye Huanting was Liu Shiyu's master's thesis advisor at Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 傅家骥是刘士余在清华大学的博士论文导师。
description.en: Fu Jiaji was Liu Shiyu's doctoral thesis advisor at Tsinghua University.

position.en: Deputy Governor, Counselor at the Head Office, etc.

description.zh-cn: 刘士余自1996年起在中国人民银行任职，历任银行司助理巡视员、副司长，银行监管二司副司长、司长，办公厅主任，行长助理，副行长等职，直至2014年10月。2023年，他再度履新，任中国人民银行总行参事。
description.en: Liu Shiyu worked at the People's Bank of China starting in 1996, holding positions such as Assistant Inspector and Deputy Director of the Banking Department, Deputy Director and Director of Banking Supervision Department II, Director of the General Office, Assistant Governor, and Deputy Governor until October 2014. In 2023, he took on a new role as a counselor at the head office of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘士余于2014年10月任中国农业银行党委书记，同年12月出任董事长，直至2016年2月。
description.en: Liu Shiyu became the Party Secretary of the Agricultural Bank of China in October 2014, and assumed the role of Chairman in December of the same year, serving until February 2016.

relationships.target: 中国证券监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 刘士余于2016年2月至2019年1月期间担任中国证券监督管理委员会主席、党委书记。
description.en: Liu Shiyu served as the Chairman and Party Secretary of the China Securities Regulatory Commission from February 2016 to January 2019.

relationships.target: 中华全国供销合作总社

position.zh-cn: 党组副书记、理事会主任
position.en: Deputy Party Secretary, Director of the Council

description.zh-cn: 刘士余于2019年1月至5月期间担任中华全国供销合作总社党组副书记、理事会主任。
description.en: Liu Shiyu served as Deputy Party Secretary and Director of the Council of the All-China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives from January to May 2019.

description.zh-cn: 在2015年中国股灾之后，刘士余于2016年2月接替肖钢，出任中国证券监督管理委员会主席，此任命被外界视为稳定市场的举措。
description.en: Following the 2015 Chinese stock market crash, Liu Shiyu replaced Xiao Gang as the Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission in February 2016, an appointment seen by the public as a move to stabilize the market.

description.zh-cn: 2019年5月19日，中央纪委国家监委宣布刘士余因涉嫌违法违纪，主动投案并配合审查调查。同年10月4日，他被处以留党察看二年、政务撤职处分，降为一级调研员。
description.en: On May 19, 2019, the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission announced that Liu Shiyu had turned himself in and was cooperating with a review and investigation for suspected violations of law and discipline. On October 4 of the same year, he was punished with two years of party probation, removed from his administrative post, and demoted to Level 1 Investigator.

description.zh-cn: 据媒体报道，刘士余被调查可能与南京银行资管部总经理戴娟失联一案有关，该案被认为是刘士余落马的导火索。
description.en: According to media reports, the investigation into Liu Shiyu may be related to the disappearance of Dai Juan, the general manager of the asset management department of the Bank of Nanjing, which is considered to be the trigger for Liu's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 在刘士余担任中国农业银行董事长和中国证监会主席期间，李克强时任国务院总理。
description.en: During Liu Shiyu's tenure as Chairman of the Agricultural Bank of China and Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission, Li Keqiang was the Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 刘士余接替肖钢担任中国证券监督管理委员会主席。
description.en: Liu Shiyu succeeded Xiao Gang as the Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 刘士余的中国证券监督管理委员会主席职位由易会满接替。
description.en: Liu Shiyu was succeeded by Yi Huiman as the Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 刘士余接替蒋超良担任中国农业银行董事长。
description.en: Liu Shiyu succeeded Jiang Chaoliang as the Chairman of the Agricultural Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘士余的中国农业银行董事长职位由周慕冰接替。
description.en: Liu Shiyu was succeeded by Zhou Mubing as the Chairman of the Agricultural Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘士余接替王侠担任中华全国供销合作总社理事会主任。
description.en: Liu Shiyu succeeded Wang Xia as the Director of the Council of the All-China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives.

description.zh-cn: 刘士余的中华全国供销合作总社理事会主任职位由喻红秋接替。
description.en: Liu Shiyu was succeeded by Yu Hongqiu as the Director of the Council of the All-China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九大中央金融系统分组讨论会上，刘士余公开指责薄熙来等人“阴谋篡党夺权”。
description.en: During a panel discussion for the central financial system at the 19th CPC National Congress, Liu Shiyu publicly accused Bo Xilai and others of 'conspiring to usurp the Party and seize power'.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九大中央金融系统分组讨论会上，刘士余公开指责周永康等人“阴谋篡党夺权”。
description.en: During a panel discussion for the central financial system at the 19th CPC National Congress, Liu Shiyu publicly accused Zhou Yongkang and others of 'conspiring to usurp the Party and seize power'.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九大中央金融系统分组讨论会上，刘士余公开指责令计划等人“阴谋篡党夺权”。
description.en: During a panel discussion for the central financial system at the 19th CPC National Congress, Liu Shiyu publicly accused Ling Jihua and others of 'conspiring to usurp the Party and seize power'.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九大中央金融系统分组讨论会上，刘士余公开指责徐才厚等人“阴谋篡党夺权”。
description.en: During a panel discussion for the central financial system at the 19th CPC National Congress, Liu Shiyu publicly accused Xu Caihou and others of 'conspiring to usurp the Party and seize power'.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九大中央金融系统分组讨论会上，刘士余公开指责郭伯雄等人“阴谋篡党夺权”。
description.en: During a panel discussion for the central financial system at the 19th CPC National Congress, Liu Shiyu publicly accused Guo Boxiong and others of 'conspiring to usurp the Party and seize power'.

description.zh-cn: 在中共十九大中央金融系统分组讨论会上，刘士余公开指责孙政才等人“阴谋篡党夺权”。
description.en: During a panel discussion for the central financial system at the 19th CPC National Congress, Liu Shiyu publicly accused Sun Zhengcai and others of 'conspiring to usurp the Party and seize power'.
